metadata.title: CVE-2022-25887 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: The package sanitize-html before 2.7.1 are vulnerable to Regular ExpressionDenial of Service (ReDoS) due to insecure global regular expressionreplacement logic of HTML comment removal.

criterions.comment: node-sanitize-html package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
jupyter-notebook package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
